downloadTitle: Compare Query Performance and Result (CQPR) Utility
downloadDescription: Compare query result sets run against OLEDB and SQL Server databases.
detailsSection: A utility that reads two queries per row from a SQL Server database table and runs each queries in multiple threads against two different database engines
systemRequirementsSection: A utility that reads two queries per row from a SQL Server database table and runs the queries in each row against an OLEDB and a SQL Server database. Each row can run in multiple threads. The utility captures query response times and compares the result sets returned from each database engine.
installInstructionSection: Download the .zip and extract it. Review the documentation, run the SQL Script to create the source table, Edit the config file and run the utility.
